𒉺 •pro > 𒈥 per > PA.RAD 𒋥

𒉺𒅈 Para pair/for

𒅆 IGI
𒉺 ugula : overseer’s 𒇽𒉺 (LU₂.UGULA)
𒉺𒈝 UGULA-lum : overseer’s
𒉿𒀝𒈝 wa-ak-lum Wache !

Sumerograms GIDRU, LUG₂, LU₉, PA, SIG₃, UGULA, ḪENDUR (WTF)
Phonetic values pa, ḫad/ḫat/ḫaṭ

𒉺 g̃idru, “sceptre” 𓎛 𓈎 𓏏 𓋾 haqit(ru) 𓌂 𓏤 ⇔ 𓌀 𓏤 𓆱 ≠ 𓍯 𓋴 𓌀
𒉺 g̃idru •sg̃ibdru “sceptre” 𒄑𒉺 measuring stick
𒉺 ḫaṭṭum “sceptre” < ḫaqṭum 𓎛 𓈎 𓏏 𓋾 ?
𒉺 ḫaṭṭum ⇔ maḫāṣum (hit, strike)
𒉺 pa ⋍ •pāi 拍 pak *pʰraːɡ (pat/beat/hit) ⇔ baì:败 pǎo:跑 (beat it;)
𒉺 sig₃, sag₃ /sag/, “to strike”
𒉺 pa ⋍ beat (sig₃, sag₃ /sag/) to beat upon, strike, fell, to make tremble, quake
𒉺 pa = kappum “wing” ⇔ 𓂝
𒉺 pa > waklum Wache watch “overseer”

𒉺 paʳ ⇔ 𒁍 púʳ

𒉺𒅁𒉺𒊒 a wild animal, phps. wild ram
